item.title: Intelligent Energy Management for Federal Electricity Commission (CFE)
item.description:
may. 2024 - may. 2024

 

Application focused on reducing energy consumption during critical peak periods, optimizing the distribution of available energy, and informing users about efficient energy use.

 

  • Figma
  • Teamwork
  • Leadership
  • Networking
  • Internet of Things
  • Amazon Web Services (AWS)

item.title: Advanced AI and IoT-Integrated Flood Prediction and Community Disaster Management System
item.description:
sept. 2024 - dic. 2024

 

Intelligent real-time monitoring and flood prediction system, with a focus on flood-prone urban areas like Tabasco. The system combines satellite, meteorological, and device data using technologies such as IoT, artificial intelligence, and cloud computing.

 

Technologies and skills:

  • Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Git
  • GitHub
  • GitHub Copilot
  • Internet of Things (IoT)
  • Python (Programming Language)
  • Artificial Intelligence (AI)
  • Linux
  • Application Programming Interfaces (API)
  • Testing
  • Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
  • Interfaz de línea de comandos (CLI)
  • Data Analysis
  • Routing Protocols
  • Public Speaking
  • Docker Products
  • Project Management
  • SOLIDWORKS

item.title: Data Intelligence
item.description:
jul. 2024 - jul. 2024jul

 

Development of a system that prioritizes reported company issues through a ticketing system, using Notion and Slack APIs to organize and visualize them in a dashboard.

 

Aptitudes:

  • Notion Productivity Software
  • Teamwork

item.title: HackUTP Landing Page
item.description:
jul. 2024 - nov. 2024

 

Platform designed to provide information about the HackUTP event. Built with Astro and deployed using GitHub Actions and GitHub Pages, with data management via Amazon RDS and integration with the event’s mobile app.

 

Technologies and skills:

  • Astro
  • JavaScript
  • Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Git
  • GitHub
  • GitHub Copilot
  • HTML
  • Teamwork
  • Linux
  • GitFlow

item.title: Inclusive Education Platform for People with Disabilities integrated with AI
item.description:
jun. 2024 - jun. 2024

 

Educational platform to promote inclusion and proper treatment of people with disabilities. It includes educational resources, workshops, interactive programs, and an AI-based chatbot to answer users’ questions.

item.title: SMARTWASTE VISION
item.description:
ago. 2024 - ago. 2024

 

Development of an automated waste classification system based on artificial intelligence that not only separates waste but also raises community awareness and monitors the status of bins, ensuring efficient management and timely collection.
